INTERCOMPANY LOAN AGREEMENT Dated as of August 18, 2024 This Loan Agreement is made by and between: ItalFin S.p.A., a company organized under the laws of Italy with its registered office at Via del Corso 123, Rome, Italy (the “Lender”), and Rotterdam Capital B.V., a company organized under the laws of its jurisdiction with its registered office at Coolsingel 50, Rotterdam, Netherlands (the “Borrower”).
RECITALS WHEREAS, the Borrower is a subsidiary or affiliate of the Lender, and both parties are members of the same multinational group; WHEREAS, the Lender agrees to extend a loan to the Borrower under terms consistent with the arm’s length principle, in accordance with applicable transfer pricing regulations; NOW, THEREFORE, the parties agree as follows: The Lender shall provide a loan in the amount of 3.2 million eurs.
The loan shall be disbursed in full on or about August 23, 2024 to a bank account specified by the Borrower.
Interest will accrue on the outstanding principal at a fixed rate of 5.4% per annum.
Such interest shall be payable annually in arrears, beginning one year from the disbursement date.
The loan shall mature on August 18, 2033, at which point the full principal and any accrued interest shall be due and payable.
The Borrower may, without incurring any fee or penalty, prepay all or part of the loan by giving at least thirty (30) days’ prior written notice to the Lender.
Each party affirms that it has full authority to enter into this Agreement and that all corporate approvals have been duly obtained.
This Agreement shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Italy.
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.
